Created: Jul. 16th, 2009

5 of the loudest craziest women on TV

Tags:Annoying, Loud women, TV Personality

Complete

  • Mary Murphy

    Dubbed the official "Queen of scream", this hot tamale advocate is similar to Stacy London in that she prefers to save her ear-piercing yelps for the right moment. But when she unleashes, watch out because no one is safe.

  • Stacy London

    Known for destroying the self-esteem of female fashion victims, the What Not to Wear co-host is an opportunistic loud-mouth. She waits for just the right moment (usually when the guest is on the verge of tears), before going in for the kill.

  • The View

    More than one woman, but they come together like Voltron to form one of the loudest group of TV hens ever assembled!

  • Nancy Grace

    An ex-prosecutor turned pundit who doesn't let her guests talk for fear of actually hearing an opposing view. She is so loved that fans have created a website in her honour: http://www.nancygracemustdie.ca/

  • Judge Judy

    Trying to promote the idea that you don't have to be right, as long as you're loud.
